pkgmetadata.longdescription: Local Projections Impulse Response Functions // Contains functions to estimate linear and nonlinear impulse responses based on local projections by Jord (2005) doi:10.1257/0002828053828518. Nonlinear impulse responses are estimated for two regimes based on a transition function as used in Auerbach and Gorodnichenko (2012) doi:10.1257/pol.4.2.1.
